required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of SHR-1701 With or Without Chemotherapy in Patients With Stage III NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multicenter Phase II Clinical Trial of SHR-1701 With or Without Chemotherapy in the Treatment of Unresectable Stage III Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR-1701 with or without chemotherapy in the treatment of unresectable stage III non-small cell lung cancer

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the initiation of the first dose to 3 years
From the initiation of the first dose to 3 years

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the initiation of the first dose to 3 years
From the initiation of the first dose to 3 years
From the initiation of the first dose to 3 years
secondary_outcome.description: time to death or distant metastasis

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the initiation of the first dose to 90 days after the last dose

intervention.description: Drug: SHR-1701 30mg/kg Drug: Paclitaxel 175mg/m2 Drug: Carboplatin AUC 5

overall_official.affiliation: Guangdong General Hospital & Guangdong Academy of Medical Sciences
